items.sentence: Tom can probably answer that question for you.
I just found out that Tom has moved to Boston.
Tom is a thirteen-year-old boy from Australia.
How long have you been working as a carpenter?
I hope that Tom and Mary don't get here early.
You're not gong to stay here all day, are you?
My cousin who lives in Boston is a good skier.
As soon as we get the answer, we'll phone you.
I have one big brother and two little sisters.
How can you be so optimistic about the future?
